name: Intergalactic Potion Store
description:
Intergalactic Potion Store is a small role-playing game where the player takes the role of the witch named Mai. 

The aim of the game is to collect all the recipes for the 5 magic potions. To do this, the player collects the necessary materials. These must be correctly combined to produce the recipes. Some of the recipes allow the player to travel to other planets to look for additional materials there as well.

The game was made as a Gamedev assignment for school.
